sentences.en: A deep gully cut by an intermittent stream ; a dry gulch.

sentences.cn: 他是爱达荷州特温加尔奇的治安官, 我是他的副手.

sentences.en: Or we can stay close to the ranch in nearby Levengood Gulch.

trans.tran_en: a narrow deep valley formed in the past by flowing water, but usually dry now
